title: Ayiram tAn shollaDi ayyan
sahitya:
Ayiram tAn shollaDi ayyan antarangam arivEnE kuraiyEnO mAnE kurai kUrEnE mAnE


anupallavi

  pOyum pOyum undan buddhikku paTTadu rAsarasam tAnO nIyum nAnum 
onrAi nenjam viTTu shella nEram idu tAnO ...................


caraNam    veNNai uNNAdirundAl maTTum vIram mighundirukkum viduran tandadu tOlO 
pazhamO enru purindirukkum maNNai uNDadAl anrO mandam mighundirukkum
mandahAsamAghiya punnakaiyAghiya mati tarum nilavinil en mukhamAghiya 
kumudam malarndirukkum mangaiyar aNiyishai innEram mAdhavanadu 
pugazh pADiDa mandAkini mundAghiya shen tAmarai malarndiDum nI
